column1: Relatives and friends are invited to attend the funeral on Tuesday June 16
column2: 2015 at 9 a.m. from the Leonard-Lee Funeral Home 301 E. Blancke Street Linden
column3: N.J. The Funeral Mass will be offered in St. Theresa R.C. Church Linden at 10 a.m. Interment St. Gertrude Cemetery Colonia. Visiting hours are on Monday from 2-4 and & 7-9 p.m.
